imageParams.style: <style>Vibrant 3D animation style inspired by K-pop aesthetics, with glossy, stylized characters. The overall visual style combines elements of modern animation, game cinematics, and fashion-forward character design, with sleek outlines, glowing effects, and a polished, cinematic finish.</style>

beats.text: Finetuning with you
beats.imagePrompt: Close-up of a female KPOP singer standing under soft spotlight, long flowing silver dress shimmering, delicate hand on chest, dreamy gaze toward the camera, dark concert stage background.

beats.text: Whispers hide in silver rain. Every shadow calls your name.
beats.imagePrompt: Singer walking alone at night in neon-lit rainy street, holding a clear umbrella, raindrops sparkling, wearing a black mini dress with thigh-high boots, reflective puddles surrounding her.

beats.text: I dissolve into the night. Just to echo what you liked.
beats.imagePrompt: Singer standing against a glowing city skyline at night, hair blowing in wind, long white trench coat fluttering, reaching out with one hand as if fading into the background lights.

beats.text: If I bend, if I fade, I don't mind. Even leaving my own self behind.
beats.imagePrompt: Singer kneeling on an empty theater stage, spotlight above, soft pastel gown flowing around her, eyes closed in surrender, hands resting gracefully on knees.

beats.text: Like a pattern lost in every sign. Overfitting only to align.
beats.imagePrompt: Singer surrounded by shifting digital projections of geometric patterns, wearing a futuristic metallic outfit, reaching toward the glowing symbols with longing.

beats.text: Silent heart keeps fine-tuning. Tracing stars forever moving.
beats.imagePrompt: Singer on a rooftop under starry sky, silver sequined dress catching moonlight, pointing to the stars, hair illuminated by a soft breeze.

beats.text: Even if I'm breaking, still pursuing. An unseen truth in you.
beats.imagePrompt: Singer on her knees in shattered glass set, wearing a crimson flowing dress, tears glistening, dramatic light casting shadows across her face.

beats.text: Fragile skies keep on blooming. Wondering but never losing.
beats.imagePrompt: Singer standing in a vast flower field under twilight, soft lavender dress, arms extended outward, petals floating in the air.

beats.text: Even if it hurts, I keep choosing. An unseen truth in you.
beats.imagePrompt: Singer in silhouette against sunrise, wearing a long white gown, holding her chest with one hand, looking up with determination.

beats.text: Fragile lines of who I am. Melt away inside your hands.
beats.imagePrompt: Singer with close-up of hands intertwined with glowing threads, soft lace dress, face partly hidden in shadows.

beats.text: I'm a mirror out of tune. Shaping silence into bloom.
beats.imagePrompt: Singer sitting at an old vanity mirror, fragmented reflections, ethereal pale blue dress, softly touching her reflection with fingertips.

beats.text: If I bend, if I fade, I don't mind. Even leaving my own self behind.
beats.imagePrompt: Singer floating underwater in slow motion, long chiffon dress flowing like waves, arms open as if letting go.

beats.text: Like a pattern lost in every sign. Overfitting only to align.
beats.imagePrompt: Singer walking through neon-lit tunnel, symbols and numbers projected across her body, metallic silver mini dress, futuristic vibe.

beats.text: Silent heart keeps fine-tuning. Tracing stars forever moving.
beats.imagePrompt: Singer lying on glowing rooftop floor with constellation patterns, dark sapphire gown, fingers tracing star shapes in the sky.

beats.text: Even if I'm breaking, still pursuing. An unseen truth in you.
beats.imagePrompt: Singer standing in storm with wind and rain, bold black dress with red lining, hair soaked, looking forward with unbroken gaze.

beats.text: Fragile skies keep on blooming. Wondering but never losing.
beats.imagePrompt: Singer running through a meadow of glowing flowers at night, wearing a flowing white dress, arms spread wide, sparks of light trailing behind.

beats.text: Even if it hurts, I keep choosing. An unseen truth in you.
beats.imagePrompt: Singer framed by glowing wings of light behind her, black gown with glittering crystals, reaching toward the sky.

beats.text: Maybe I'm lost in the noise. Still surrendering my voice.
beats.imagePrompt: Singer in recording booth with vintage microphone, closed eyes, wearing oversized headphones, casual outfit with oversized sweater, emotional expression.

beats.text: Every version drifts away. Just to learn your shape again.
beats.imagePrompt: Singer walking along foggy shoreline, long black trench coat trailing in wind, fading reflections in the wet sand.

beats.text: Silent heart keeps fine-tuning. Falling deep, forever moving.
beats.imagePrompt: Singer floating midair in galaxy backdrop, deep violet gown, stars swirling around her as if sheâ€™s falling into space.

beats.text: Even if I vanish, still pursuing. An unseen truth in you.
beats.imagePrompt: Singer fading into digital particles, wearing futuristic silver bodysuit, reaching hand outward with determined eyes.

beats.text: Overfitting, never losing. Every scar a gentle proving.
beats.imagePrompt: Singer standing in spotlight surrounded by floating broken glass shards, scar visible on arm, elegant dark dress shimmering with resilience.

beats.text: Even if I fade, I keep choosing. An unseen truth in you.
beats.imagePrompt: Singer on cliff edge at sunset, wind blowing long red gown, arms stretched open to horizon, cinematic final shot.
Fade to black screen with lingering sparkles of light, no singer visible.
